mapper.insert: insert into college(name, concise, majors, create_time,create_by, update_time, update_by) values (#{name}, #{concise}, #{majors},#{createTime},#{createBy},#{updateTime},#{updateBy})
mapper.update: update college set update_time = #{updateTime}, update_by = #{updateBy} where id = #{id}
mapper.delete: delete from college where id in #{id}
mapper.select:
select * from college
and name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
order by create_time desc
